EmailTemplate.description: Send notification to customer whenever case is created.
EmailTemplate.name: Case Create Notification to Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirming your Ecolab Case {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for contacting the Ecolab Support Team. This message is to confirm that we have received your request and have opened a case for your issue regarding {!Case.Subject}.
For your reference, your case number is {!Case.CaseNumber} and and you can check on the status of your case by clicking the following link:
{!$Label.Ecolab_Community_URL}{!Case.Id}
If you are unable to click the above link, please copy and paste it into your browser's address bar.
Thank you for being an Ecolab customer.
Best,
Ecolab Support Team
-----
Please do not reply to this email. This is a system generated email to inform you of updates to your Ecolab Case. This message was generated from https://connect.ecolab.com.
